questions.question: The scientific value of wildlife is

choices.answer: the enjoyment of wildlife's beauty
studying wildlife for their use in medications etc
the interaction of wildlife in nature
the use of wildlife to make money

questions.question: The aesthetic value of wildlife is

choices.answer: studying & research of wildlife for their use in medications
the interaction of wildlife in nature
the use of wildlife to make money
the enjoyment of wildlife's beauty

questions.question: The ecological value of wildlife is

choices.answer: studying & research of wildlife for their use in medications
the interaction of wildlife in nature, they fill niches
the use of wildlife to make money
the enjoyment of wildlife's beauty

questions.question: Which of the following are basic values of wildlife?

choices.answer: Commercial Value
Breeding Value
Scientific Value
Ecological Value

questions.question: Which of the following are basic values of wildlife?

choices.answer: Ecological Value
Aesthetic Value
Game Value
Observational Value

questions.question: A species is considered extinct if:

choices.answer: There are only members of one gender of that species left.
There are no members of that species left on Earth.
All members of the species are sterile (can not reproduce).
There are less than 100 members of that species left.

questions.question: A species is considered endangered if:

choices.answer: it is predicted to go extinct in the next 5 years.
It was said to be extinct but some members were found again.
it is predicted to go extinct in the next 10 years.
it is in danger of extinction throughout all of its range.

questions.question: What is the purpose of the endangered species act?

choices.answer: To prevent groups from harming species and their ecosystems.
To clean up ecosystems and plant new trees.
To protect endangered species and their ecosystems.
To punish people and organizations that harm ecosystems.

questions.question: Why should wildlife conservation be important to people everywhere?

choices.answer: Each species has evolved to be adapted to its environment.
Organisms have a place in food chains to help ecosystems.
Each organism looks different and therefore are important.
Each species can be sold for money.

questions.question: Which statement best summarizes the concept of wildlife conservation?

choices.answer: It is the practice of protecting wild plant species.
It is the practice of protecting natural habitats.
It is protecting wild plant/animal species and their habitat
It is the practice of protecting wild animal species.
